hero.title: Our Products
hero.subtitle: Precision Engineered Casting Manufacturing Products
hero.description: Discover our comprehensive range of high-quality brass casting solutions.

categories.name: Plumbing & Sanitary Castings
categories.description: High-precision brass valves, connectors, flanges, and tap bodies for plumbing and sanitary applications.

categories.name: Automotive Castings
categories.description: Precision brass fittings, bushings, brackets, and fluid connectors for automotive industry requirements.

categories.name: Gas & Fuel System Components
categories.description: Specialized brass regulators, nozzles, and fittings for gas and fuel system applications.

categories.name: Electrical Hardware Castings
categories.description: Precision brass components including switchgear parts, fuse holders, and electrical connectors.

categories.name: Industrial Machinery Parts
categories.description: Complex brass castings including impellers, collars, housings, and couplings for industrial machinery.

categories.name: Custom Specialized Castings
categories.description: Bespoke brass casting solutions tailored to customer specifications and drawings.
